reviewText:
I would like to know what Matt Monro (if him) has to do  with this DVD. Thank you
Giuliano Fournier

Here is what you get with this disk: (1) a collection of movie trailers and news clips about Monroe's life; (2) a collection of 24 audio only tracks of her singing in her films; and (3) a collection of posters for her films.  What you do not get are actual visual clips of her singing in the films (save those excerpts included in the trailers).
